byline.contributor: Charles V. Bagli and Samantha Schmidt contributed reporting.

abstract: New York City police charge Stephen Rogata of Virginia with felony reckless endangerment and misdemeanor trespassing after he stops Midtown Manhattan traffic for three hours while climbing exterior of 68-story Trump Tower; Rogata is taken to Bellevue Hospital for psychiatric evaluation.

headline.print_headline: Trump Tower Takes Center Stage Again
headline.main: Trump Tower Climber Now Faces Charges

snippet: Stephen Rogata, 19, of Great Falls, Va., was charged with reckless endangerment and trespassing in connection with his unauthorized ascent of the Fifth Avenue building....
lead_paragraph: Stephen Rogata, 19, of Great Falls, Va., was charged with reckless endangerment and trespassing in connection with his unauthorized ascent of the Fifth Avenue building.
